meanings.definition: A group of enzymes that catalyze the transfer of an amino group from one molecule to another.
meanings.sent1: The aminotransferases in our body help move amino groups around.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study aminotransferases to understand how amino groups are transferred.
meanings.sent3: The aminotransferases had a party, passing amino groups like hot potatoes!
meanings.sent4: In the chemical dance of life, aminotransferases are the skilled movers of amino groups.
meanings.sent5: Imagine aminotransferases as tiny amino group taxis, shuttling passengers between molecules.

meanings.definition: Aminotransferases are important in the synthesis of amino acids.
meanings.sent1: Amino acids are like building blocks, and aminotransferases help assemble them.
meanings.sent2: The body relies on aminotransferases to create essential amino acids.
meanings.sent3: The aminotransferases were the heroes in the amino acid production line.
meanings.sent4: Just as conductors lead an orchestra, aminotransferases orchestrate amino acid synthesis.
meanings.sent5: Aminotransferases are the chefs cooking up a delicious amino acid recipe in our bodies.

meanings.definition: Elevated levels of aminotransferases in the blood may indicate liver damage.
meanings.sent1: Doctors check for aminotransferases to see if the liver is healthy.
meanings.sent2: High levels of aminotransferases could signal trouble in the liver.
meanings.sent3: The aminotransferases in the blood were like alarm bells for the liver.
meanings.sent4: Aminotransferases act as messengers, warning of potential liver damage.
meanings.sent5: The rising levels of aminotransferases painted a concerning picture of liver health.
